welcome_message_body: Welcome to Burnaby, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant cultural scene, and stunning mountain views. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Hop & Vine Tap House
restaurants.description: Hop & Vine Tap House is a burger joint located in Burnaby.

restaurants.name: InGrain Pastificio
restaurants.description: InGrain Pastificio is a italian restaurant located in North Vancouver.
restaurants.address: 126-1133 Mt. Seymour Rd, North Vancouver BC V7H 2Y4

restaurants.name: Green Leaf Café
restaurants.description: Green Leaf Café is a japanese restaurant located in Burnaby.

restaurants.name: Dae Ji
restaurants.description: Dae Ji is a korean restaurant located in Coquitlam.

restaurants.name: A&W Restaurant
restaurants.description: A&W Restaurant is a fast food restaurant located in North Vancouver.
restaurants.address: 128-1133 Mount Seymour Road, North Vancouver BC V7H 2Y4

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coal Harbour Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Floatplane Terminal
terminals.description: The floatplane terminal at Coal Harbour Airport serves flights to and from nearby islands and coastal destinations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boundary Bay Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Boundary Bay Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
